channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MMOX

item.title: DFIR & SOC - Roadmap (From Zero To Hero)
item.description: The 'SOC & DFIR Roadmap' is a structured guide for those pursuing careers in Security Operations Center (SOC) analysis and Digital Forensics and Incident Response (DFIR). It provides a clear learning path from basic cybersecurity and networking concepts to advanced topics like threat management and malware analysis. With a mix of free and paid resources, plus practical exercises, this roadmap helps build essential skills and hands-on experience for success in SOC and DFIR roles.

item.title: Cyber Defenders - Ulysses
item.description: A Linux server was possibly compromised and a forensic analysis is required in order to understand what really happened. Hard disk dumps and memory snapshots of the machine are provided in order to solve the challenge.

item.title: Ryuk Ransomware Analysis Memory Detection - Part 1
item.description: Ryuk is a ransomware which encrypts its victim’s files and asks for a ransom via bitcoin to release the original files. It is has been observed being used to attack companies or professional environments. Cybersecurity experts figured out that Ryuk and Hermes ransomware shares pieces of codes. Hermes is commodity ransomware that has been observed for sale on dark-net forums and used by multiple threat actors. And I am going to do some analysis form a forensics perspective
